full_summary:
### Advanced Phased Array Ultrasonic Testing Systems
#### Government Tender Announcement

**Title:** W3474-240198 - Advanced Phased Array Ultrasonic Testing Systems

**Reference Number:** WS4365342641-Doc4365373216

**Solicitation Number:** WS4365342641

**Amendment Number:** 3

**Publication Date:** 2023-12-21

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-16 at 14:00 EST

**Amendment Date:** 2024-01-11

**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-01-12

**Expected Contract End Date:** 2027-01-12

**Trade Agreements:** The procurement is open to bidders worldwide in accordance with the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and Canada's free trade agreements.

**Industry Category:** Laboratory and Measuring and Observing and Testing Equipment

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price bidding

**End User:** Department of National Defence (DND), CFB Trenton

**Location:** Ontario (except National Capital Region)

**Delivery Address:**

 Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
11, rue Laurier, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Québec
Canada K1A 0S5

**Contact Information:**

Andrew Denbeigh (SPAC/PSPC)
andrew.denbeigh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Bidder Information

Bidders are requested to submit their proposals by 2024-01-16 at 14:00 EST. Bids submitted after this time will be deemed non-responsive.

The Department of National Defence, CFB Trenton, requires the provision of 3 Advanced Phased Array Ultrasonic Testing Systems, with an option for the purchase of an additional 3 systems. The initial 3 systems are to be delivered on or before 2024-03-29.

Please note that Canada intends to award one contract to meet this requirement. 

**Note:** The contact information and document information are provided for your convenience. Please refer to the official tender notice for complete details. You can find the full announcement by following the link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18345086?extsite=MTgzNDUwODZfQU
